001package src.pkg_items;
002import src.pkg_rooms.Room;
003import src.pkg_models.Player;
004import java.util.HashMap;
005/**
006 * Manages a collection of items. Allows adding, retrieving, and removing items.
007 * Also provides a method to list items based on context.
008 * 
009 * @author Pierre MATAR
010 */
011public class ItemList
012{
013    private HashMap<String, Item> aItemList;
014    
015    /**
016 * Constructs an ItemList with an empty HashMap of items.
017 */
018    public ItemList() {
019        this.aItemList = new HashMap<String, Item>();
020    }
021    /**
022 * Adds an item to the collection.
023 * 
024 * @param pItem The item to add to the collection.
025 */
026  
027       public void addItem(final Item pItem) {
028        this.aItemList.put(pItem.getName(), pItem);
029    }
030    /**
031 * Retrieves an item from the collection by its name.
032 * 
033 * @param pItemName The name of the item to retrieve.
034 * @return The item if found; otherwise, null.
035 */
036    public Item getItem(final String pItemName) {
037        return this.aItemList.get(pItemName);
038    }
039    /**
040 * Removes an item from the collection by its name.
041 * 
042 * @param pItemName The name of the item to remove.
043 */
044    
045    public void removeItem(final String pItemName) {
046        this.aItemList.remove(pItemName);
047    }
048 /**
049     * Returns a string representation of all items in the collection.
050     * Displays different formats based on the context.
051     * 
052     * @param pO The context (Room or Player).
053     * @return A string listing all items or a message if none.
054     */
055    public String getAllItemString(final Object pO) {
056        StringBuilder vSb;
057        int index = 0;
058        if (pO instanceof Room) {
059            if (this.aItemList.isEmpty()) return ".\nNo item here. ";
060            vSb = new StringBuilder("\nItems available :");
061
062        }
063            
064        else if (pO instanceof Player) {
065            if (this.aItemList.isEmpty()) return "\nYou are not carrying any items.";
066            vSb = new StringBuilder("\nYour items -> ");
067
068        }
069        else {
070            if (this.aItemList.isEmpty()) return "\nYou can't eat...";
071                vSb = new StringBuilder("\nYou can eat only these items : ");
072
073        }
074        
075        
076        for (String itemName : this.aItemList.keySet()) {
077            vSb.append(itemName +" (" + this.getItem(itemName).getItemWeight() + ")").append(index == this.aItemList.size() - 1 ? "" : " / ");
078            index++;
079        }
080     
081        return vSb.toString();
082    }
083    
084 
085    
086}
